author: Alexandra Hutzler
title: U.S. Intelligence Officials Accuse China of Underreporting Coronavirus Cases and Death Toll, Report Says
description: One official told Bloomberg that the findings were delivered to the White House last week in a classified report.
content:
U.S. intelligence officials say that China underreported both the number of cases and the death toll the country suffered from the coronavirus outbreak, according to a report published Wednesday by Bloomberg.
Three unnamed intelligence officials confirmed th… [+2300 chars]
